# Introduction to roadDB
Welcome to `roadDB`! This vignette will guide you through the core functionalities of the package, demonstrating how to use its key functions for data querying.

`roaDB` is designed to make possible easy querying of ROAD data, providing intuitive functions for both beginners and experienced R users.

## Installation
You can install `roadDB` directly from GitHub using `devtools`:

```r
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("sommergeo/roadDB")
```

Before you can use any of the functions, youll need to load the package into your R session:
```r
library(roadDB)
```
